name: Finance for Non-Finance Managers
content: Dear & Esteemed Colleagues, Greetings! Greater Vision are pleased to extend a warm welcome to you to the Executive Training Programme on ‘Trading Opportunities Using Finance for Non-Finance Managers (FNFM) Trading’ to be organized in the beautiful city of Vienna – Austria from June 7-9, 2019 Training Objectives The primary aim of the proposed program/seminar is to enable the participants to understand the fundamental financial concepts, carefully read/analyse financial statements, prepare budgets given the goals and targets of the organization, analyze financial performance and identify key financial indicators for effective decision-making. This three-day training program is helpful to managers to acquire essential skills and knowledge of financial concepts/principles to handle the dynamic business environment in this competitive landscape effiently. The main feature of the proposed training is that participants will deal with and practice many real-life cases with the active support and guidance of experienced professionals who are experts in this area. Course Content! • The Language of accounting and finance • Understanding and analyzing financial statements • Profit versus cash and why we need both • Capital budgeting tools • Budgeting, planning and forecasting • Exploring cost-volume-profit (CVP) relationship • Understanding key financial ratios and appraisal tools Eligibility We recommend this course for the following: Owners of a business Directors/Senior Executives/General Managers Mid and senior-level managers Project Managers Management Consultants Business Analysts76 Head of divisions/functions Finance Support Staff Self-employed professionals Managers/Decision-makers of companies in marketing, operations, human resources and other non-financial areas Awards A participation certificate will be awarded on the successful completion of this program. For more details please visit: www.globalbizresearch.org E-Mail: training@globalbizresearch.org Website: http://globalbizresearch.org/Austriatraining/
